name: Trainduino
tagline: This is the home for Trainduino. It combines the beautifull modeltrains with the power of the Arduino!
body:
### Welcome to the official website of Trainduino.
Trainduino is a collection of Arduino sketches & hardware for modeltrains.
More soon here!

### Support or Contact
Having problems with Trainduino? Open an issue on Github or contact me, I'm sure we can sort this out!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
